member.name: FORMAT_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Contains information used in formatting a contiguous set of disk tracks. It is used by theIOCTL_DISK_FORMAT_TRACKS control code.

member.name: FORMAT_PARAMETERS.MediaType
member.summary: The media type. For a list of values, see.

member.name: FORMAT_PARAMETERS.StartCylinderNumber
member.summary: The cylinder number at which to begin the format.

member.name: FORMAT_PARAMETERS.EndCylinderNumber
member.summary: The cylinder number at which to end the format.
